meanings.definition: To take in or receive something within itself.
meanings.sent1: The hungry cell intussuscepts nutrients to stay alive.
meanings.sent2: The vacuum cleaner intussuscepts dirt from the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The greedy monster intussuscepts all the cookies in one go.
meanings.sent4: The black hole intussuscepts light, leaving only darkness behind.
meanings.sent5: The sponge intussuscepts water quickly, becoming heavy and full.

meanings.definition: To insert or introduce something into something else.
meanings.sent1: The magician intussuscepts a coin into his palm without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent2: The chef intussuscepts herbs into the sauce for added flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf intussuscepts a prank into the daily routine of the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The hacker intussuscepts a virus into the computer system, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The artist intussuscepts emotion into every brushstroke, creating a masterpiece.
